derivation: middle voice from a compound of G5384 (φιλοτιμέομαι) and G5092 (φιλοτιμέομαι);
strongs_def: to be fond of honor, i.e. emulous (eager or earnest to do something)
outline:
1. to be fond of honour
    1. to be actuated by love of honour
    2. from a love of honour to strive to bring something to pass
  2. to be ambitious
    1. to strive earnestly, make it one's aim
